text: Danfu baozuo de he huanrao baozuo de (tianshi), dou zansong tamen de zhu, dou gui xin ta, dou wei xindao zhe qiurao, tamen shuo:â€œWomen de zhu a! Zai enhui he zhishi fangmian, ni shi baoluowanxiang de, qiu ni she you huiguo zi xin, erqie zunxun ni de zhengdao zhe. Qiu ni baohu tamen, mian shou huo yu de xingfa
